files.patch: @@ -163,1 +163,1 @@ - * * UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS is not set. See Unicode Support. + * UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS is not set. See Unicode Support. @@ -254,2 +254,3 @@ - * A word boundary: {@code (?:(?<=\w)(?=\W)|(?<=\W)(?=\w))} (the location - * where a non-word character abuts a word character) + * A word boundary: + * at the beginning or at the end of a line if a word character ({@code \w}) appears there; + * or between a word ({@code \w}) and a non-word character ({@code \W}), in either order.
